byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: The private equity firm Silver Lake is in talks with Microsoft and the Canadian Pension Plan Investment Board about taking part a possible bid for Yahoo.
snippet: The private equity firm Silver Lake is in talks with Microsoft and the Canadian Pension Plan Investment Board about taking part a possible bid for Yahoo.
lead_paragraph: Potential groups of bidders for Yahoo are continuing to emerge, as suitors keep circling the faltering Internet giant.

headline.main: Silver Lake Group Considers Yahoo Bid
